scripts.resetDb:
echo '
wiping and rebuilding db
' && node scripts/reset-db.js
scripts.copyConfigSample:
echo '
copying fresh config
' && cp config/config-sample.ts config/config.ts
scripts.createGitignore:
echo '
creating gitignore
' && touch .gitignore && echo 'node_modules
yarn-*
config/config.*' >> .gitignore
scripts.setup: yarn && yarn copyConfigSample && yarn createGitignore && yarn tsc
